name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Later, about an hour ago, Aier Eye Hospital issued a statement saying that the incident occurred on December 12, 2019. The patient in the video was not punched, but because the patient tried to touch the eye during the operation, the doctor pressed the patient in a hurry to remind him, and there was no motive or behavior to hurt the patient.
The patient had misunderstandings after the operation. After the doctor explained to the patient and his family, the two sides have resolved the misunderstanding and reached an understanding.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Later, Ai Fen continued to provide revelations, saying that the hospital director Feng Guiqiang often beat the poor who came to have free surgery.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens said that some high school math exams have already appeared with question templates similar to those during the Cultural Revolution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: As the year draws to a close, many places have issued documents emphasizing that "tight days" should become the norm.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 20, Shanghai. Due to the recent "quasi-fixed income" delay in repayment of Haiyin Wealth, someone who bought 500,000 yuan of wealth management products was suddenly informed of overdue payment two weeks before maturity, and a large number of investors went to Haiyin's headquarters to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 20, Haidong City, Qinghai Province. The Qinghai earthquake triggered a sand surge that buried the houses in Jintian Village, Meiyi Village, and Caotan Village. From the video footage, we can see that the height of the silt is close to the roof. The rescue team is on the scene

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, in Xiangyang, Hubei, an Audi car drove with a man on its hood for several meters before hitting several electric bikes. Afterwards, the citizens dragged the unconscious driver out of the cab. According to nearby merchants, the car lost control and drove with the man on its hood for several meters before hitting three more people before stopping.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, primary and secondary schools and kindergartens across the country have issued initiatives to refuse to celebrate Christmas.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, Xiang Dongliang, who had previously reported Hu Xijin for illegally climbing over the Great Firewall, again reported Hu Xijin for shorting the Chinese economy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
What do you think is the Chinese character of the year in 2023?

The "Chinese Review 2023" event, jointly organized by the National Language Resource Testing and Research Center, the Commercial Press, and Xinhuanet, announced the 2023 "Word of the Year" in Beijing on December 20

The domestic word of the year is "振"

The domestic word of the year is "优质发展"

The international word of the year is "危机"

The international word of the year is "ChatGPT"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 21, a South Korean oil tanker capsized and exploded near the Sutong Bridge in Jiangsu.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Welcome everyone to speak and like

Before the 23rd, I will launch a vote for the top 4 words in the comment area to let everyone choose the Chinese character of the year in 2023

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In a certain place in Hunan, college students who have just reached adulthood are required to buy pension insurance in their hometown villages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 20, Chongqing Contemporary City was left unfinished and the person in charge absconded with the money. The owners gathered at the sales office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In Jiaozhou, Qingdao, Shandong, teachers’ salaries are no longer paid. It is said that the government is borrowing money to pay salaries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 21, Huizhou Jinzhonghuan Plaza withheld wages for migrant workers. The workers slept in front of the company in freezing weather to demand their wages. During this period, the workers approached the Labor Bureau but to no avail.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students from Hubei University submitted their own articles on how to participate in "whole-process democracy":

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @ArnoIdlGrayson Selecting a class monitor may be the only democratic practice for many Chinese people in their lifetime

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Supplement: The elected representatives are the National People's Congress representatives.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Later, the patient's son spoke out, saying that such a person should not be a doctor.
He also said that the hospital compensated him 500 yuan afterwards.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the local Health Commission has ordered the suspension of Feng Guiqiang's position as hospital director and he is still under investigation.
